# UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.max

**Case**

Spine at the right or bottom edge of the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case max
```

## Discussion

One view controller is displayed at a time.

## Constants

- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.none**: No spine.
- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.min**: Spine at the left or top edge of the screen.
- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation.mid**: Spine in the middle or the screen.
